tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.18
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArraySNAP False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT output_data_MOVES $output_data_MOVES name SAGA.shapes_points.18 INPUT $INPUT SNAP $SNAP DISTANCE $DISTANCE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT outputType_MOVES $OutputSection_MOVES.outputType_MOVES transmissionMode_MOVES $OutputSection_MOVES.transmissionMode_MOVES

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: SNAP
param.label: Snap Features
param.help: Snap Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_MOVES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MOVES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
